description: To provide scholarship assistance to declared Operations and Supply Chain Management majors who are full-time undergraduate students. Eligibility Requirements Undergraduate Full-Time Student Operations and Supply Chain Management Majors Selection Process 3.0 GPA or higher preferred but not required APICS member preferred Financial need will be considered Preference goes to an APICS student chapter member or student involved in other university related student leadership activities

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
